name: Face Raiders
overview: Face Raiders is a game that came preinstalled with the Nintendo 3DS, making use of the 3D visuals and 3DS camera. Players take photos of their face, or the faces of their friends and family, which is the used by various "face raiders". Players must shoot the face raiders to free the faces. Additionally, Face Raiders has the ability to use faces that it detects from photos in the 3DS camera app.
